about_the_game:
Heaven Crawler is a cozy, yet challenging roguelite hack-n-slash dungeon crawler arpg.

Epic maquete visual style, in an isometric, vibes-filled, Heavenly Diorama!

Indulge yourself with a fresh look within the genre, designed to enhance a journey of colossal proportions.

Make your way through rooms full of robots to ascend the tower

The tower, riddled with mystery and secrets has over 10 unique Zones, each with unique rooms, traps, challenges and enemies to defeat. Gain money, level up, get better equipment and improve each run!

Mix-and-match Helmets, Mechanical Arms and Armors to build your own playstyle!

There are no classes in the game, instead each piece of gear unlocks diferent stats and abilities for you to choose and make your own!

Be wary and use the Elements to your favor in order to master each Zone!

There are over 7 elements fully reactive with player, enemies and props like electricty, fire, ice and corrosion.

Physics-based combat and strategy!

Use physics to your favor and throw, punch, break and evade fully breakable props and enemies, but be wary of falling!

Buy, sell, craft, Improve & expand your Equipment

You can unlock NPC's by setting them free, rescuing or defeating them on your way up. They will aid you in your journey with their craft, being Helmets, Armor, Crawlers, Lore, Secret Maps and more!

Chat with NPC's to learn about the tower and the world left behind!

Interact with NPC robots that are also making their way through the tower, seek their help and learn from their mistakes.

At the end of each zone a Colossal Boss awaits your mastery!

There is a Big Boss at the end of each Zone, as well as other secrets and mini Bossess to test your skills.

Each defeat is an opportunity to learn and grow!

Everytime you die, you go back to lobby with some of your money, lose all exp, but gain Research on the equipment you used, improving it for your next run.

The Full Game will Feature:

  • 8 Elemental Modifiers
  • 10 Zones with unique Hazards
  • 11 Multi-phase Bosses
  • 20+ NPC’s to interact with
  • 20+ Traps with Elemental Modifiers
  • 100+ Enemies with unique Behaviour
  • 200+ Pieces of Equipment Gear to Mix-n-Match
  • Endless Rooms & Possibilities
  • Beautiful Orchestral Soundtrack

WISHLIST NOW

short_description: Heaven Crawler is an atmospheric isometric roguelite hack-n-slash dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Traverse through an ever-changing babelian structure filled with robots. Collect Helmets, Armors, Mechanical Arms and strengthen your character to ascend to Heaven and save your mother's soul!
